name: mykad
description: Library to validate, parse, generate, and format Malaysian identity card (MyKad) numbers

scripts.bundle: npm run build && node ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js dist/index.js --standalone mykad -o browser/mykad.js && node ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs --output browser/mykad.min.js --compress --mangle -- browser/mykad.js
